title: Heidi Klum looks frightful as she shares sneak peek of her costume for A-list annual Halloween party
text:
She's known for going all out with her over-the-top Halloween outfits.

And while Heidi Klum has yet to reveal the theme of this year's costume, she did give fans a glimpse of her bold look in the five-second Instagram video she shared on Saturday.

The film showed close-ups of the 46-year-old wearing a wild blue brain headpiece and lots of long blue hair as she preened for the camera.

Scroll down for videos

Sneak peek: Heidi Klum gave fans a sneak peek at her Halloween outfit in an Instagram short she posted on Saturday

There was no sign of her Tokio Hotel rocker husband Tom Kaulitz but Heidi has said that their costumes will be matched up.

Halloween falls next Thursday but many people are celebrating it with parties this weekend, including Paris Hilton.

And Heidi got off to a good start by donning a silver mini-dress and lots of silver face and body paint for Paris Hilton's Beverly Hills bash on Thursday evening.

Her hair was highlighted green and blown out to massive proportions.

On full view: Heidi says it will take 10 hours to get into her costume for her Thursday evening Halloween bash and she's going to get ready in the Amazon store front in NYC on 34th Street

Tom opted for silver face paint and a green beard and mustache as he stood next to her wearing a denim shirt over a white vest and pale blue jeans.

Heidi shared snaps of her passionately kissing her handsome husband of just eight months.

Her brainiac look is likely for her own star-studded party, an annual event that she hosts every year.

Off to a good start: Heidi donned a silver mini-dress and silver face and body paint for Paris Hilton's Beverly Hills bash on Thursday. Husband Tom Kaulitz also got into the Halloween spirit with silver face paint and a sparkly green beard

Heidi intends to prep for Thursday night's event by getting ready in the Amazon store front in NYC on 34th street.

She revealed that her outfit 'will take 10 hours' to put on 'but Tom's will be easier,' she told People earlier in the month.

'I felt bad for him [as Shrek] last year even though he's just as nuts as me.'
description: The 46-year-old model and TV host preened for the camera in the five-second Instagram video she shared on Saturday. But she didn't give away any clues as to what her costume was..
